Atomic_data¶

Overview¶

This module is like a database. It contains data about atomic information used in chiripa

Example¶

import chiripa as chi
d1 = chi.atomic_mass["C"]
print(d1)
# print 12.01

d3 = chi.element_cov_radius["N"]
print(d3)
# print 0.68

d2 = chi.element_vdw_truhlar_radius["C"]
print(d2)
# print 1.40

# Calculation of the vdW volume
element_vdw_vmd_volume_bondi = dict()
factor = 4.0 / 3.0 *  3.14159265359
for key, val in element_vdw_vmd_radius_bondi.items():
    4.0 * Pi / 3.0 = 4.188790205
    element_vdw_vmd_volume_bondi[key] = round(factor * val*val*val,2)
for item, v in element_vdw_vmd_volume_bondi.items():
    print("'{0:s}': {1:.02f},".format(item, v))

v2 = chi.element_vdw_vmd_volume_bondi["C"]
print(v2)
# print 20.58

d1 = chi.distances_revaluated_Okuwaki["c3-c3"]
print(d1)
# print 3.65

API¶

  • atomic_mass (dict) -> Example atomic_mass[“F”]=19.00

  • element_cov_radius (dict) –> Example element_cov_radius[“H”]= 0.23. Covalent radii in angstroms,supplementary info in: https://jcheminf.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/1758-2946-4-26

  • maximal_valences: Maximum valence for each atom

  • element_vdw_truhlar_radius (dict) –> van der Waals radii in angstroms, Mantina et al. J. Phys. Chem. A, Vol. 113, No. 19, 2009, 5806-5812 (Table 12) (https://pubs.acs.org/doi/10.1021/jp8111556)

  • distances_revaluated_Okuwaki (dict) –> Okuwaki, K. et al. J. Phys. Chem. B 2018, 122, 338−347 http://pubs.acs.org/doi/10.1021/acs.jpcb.7b08461

  • element_vdw_vmd_radius_bondi (dict) –> van der Waals radii are taken from A. Bondi, J. Phys. Chem., 68, 441 - 452, 1964 (https://pubs.acs.org/doi/10.1021/j100785a001), except the value for H, which is taken from R.S. Rowland & R. Taylor, J.Phys.Chem., 100, 7384 - 7391, 1996. /https://pubs.acs.org/doi/10.1021/jp953141%2B) Radii that are not available in ither of these publications have RvdW = 2.00 Å. The radii for Ions (Na, K, Cl, Ca, Mg, and Cs are based on the CHARMM27 Rmin/2 parameters for (SOD, POT, CLA, CAL, MG, CES) by default.

  • element_vdw_vmd_volume_bondi (dict) –> Van der Waals volume from element_vdw_vmd_radius_bondi

Table Okuwaki atom types:

atom_type

definition

molecule

c3

sp3 carbon

C2H6

c2

sp2 carbon

C2H4

ca

aromatic carbon

C6H6

hc

hydrogen bonded to aliphatic carbon

C2H6

ha

hydrogen bonded to aromatic carbon

C6H6

no

nitrogen of the nitro group

CH3NO2

o

oxygen with one atom

CH3CHO

on

oxygen of the nitro group

CH3NO2
